A good school for water resource technologies. Most of the instructors work in their related fields.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {120030=Gateway is an amazing college that offers so many opportunities to their students to flourish. I transferred from Yavapai College in fall 2013 and I am so glad I did. At Gateway I have received great advisement, great professors and quality education. I would recommend Gateway to anyone seeking a quality college education., 126743=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 109718=I have taken my pre-requisites here and other Maricopa Community Colleges. I am currently accepted into the 2014 Surgical Technology program. I find that GateWay and all Maricopa Community Colleges to be excellent schools. The professors are great and you can tell they love what they do.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Erica from Glendale, AZ 08/27/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 35 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Serious, driven, working Tips for prospective students Use all the resources the campus has to offer. Get there early, for better parking. In three sentences This is the best community college I have ever attended. The teachers are amazing and full of enthusiasm, which is refreshing. Also, the campus is extremely clean and I have always found a parking spot.
